name: King of Winter
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Eve Ortiz, Genesis Espinal, Michael Edosa

King of Winter

Play as an unnamed wanderer in a snowy, barren forest looking for food to survive the winter. Use WASD controls to walk the snowy country and hunt for bears and deer using IJKL as your shooting buttons. Meet the the objectives before time runs out to survive the winter or risk a snowy, frostbitten death! Will you be the king of winter?
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
